thread.title: Kerry, Netanyahu Discuss Recent Violence In Israel
thread.title_full: Kerry, Netanyahu Discuss Recent Violence In Israel

author: Michele Kelemen
title: Kerry, Netanyahu Discuss Recent Violence In Israel
text:
Kerry, Netanyahu Discuss Recent Violence In Israel October 22, 2015 4:29 PM ET Twitter 
Audio for this story from All Things Considered will be available at approximately 7:00 p.m. ET. 
Secretary of State John Kerry meets Israel's prime minister Thursday in a bid to calm Israeli-Palestinian tensions. Kerry also huddles with major players on Syria, a day after Russia hosted Bashar al-Assad. You must be signed in to leave a comment. Sign In / Register Please keep your community civil.
